description: Try our easy to follow Chilli Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Tree nut free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chilli Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Lebanese cucumbers, halved, deseeded and angle sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Remove meat from chicken, discarding skin and bones. Shred meat.
Combine coleslaw in a bowl with cucumber and chicken. Top with shallots, mint and noodles. Stir chilli sauce and fish sauce together. Drizzle over salad and serve with lime wedges.
